description:
Provides a Skytap Network resource. Networks are not top-level elements of the Skytap API.
Rather, they are elements properly contained within an environment.
Operations on them are implicitly on the containing environment.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Domain.description: Domain name for the Skytap network. Limited to 64 characters.

EnvironmentId.description: ID of the environment you want to attach the network to. If updating with a new one then the network will be recreated.

Name.description: User-defined name of the network. Limited to 255 characters. UTF-8 character type.

Subnet.description: Defines the subnet address and subnet mask size in CIDR format (for example, 10.0.0.0/24). IP addresses for the VMs are assigned from this subnet and standard network services (DNS resolution, CIFS share, routes to Internet) are defined appropriately for it.

Tunnelable.description: If true, this network can be connected to other networks.
